concat.scalar: If you want to go home, you have to take the gate pass from A-Block Ground Floor reception. Fill this form, give correct reason that why you want to go home, then go to your coordinator for their approval. If you get approval from your coordinator, kindly submit it to the security guard at the University gate and you can go to home.
